column4: Guys I keep getting the message "Failed to fetch http://ppa.launchpad.net/ferramroberto/extra/ubuntu/dists/natty/main/source/Sources  404  Not Found" can I remove that repo?
yes, it'll be either in /etc/apt/sources.list or in one of the files at /etc/apt/sources.list.d/
out of curiosity. What is that repo?
i don't know, you were the one adding it... :P
